I've wanted to learn 3D but I can't lol

I've fallen in love with her again ğŸ’–ğŸ’–ğŸ’–
It was this beautiful video:
Yesterday, Wednesday, I woke up with a YouTube notification
I took three photos while holding the camera in my hand, assigned each one to an RGB channel, and then combined them into a single image.
I created chromatic aberration without algorithms or filters.
We will do marketing when I have a game to showcase the engine's capabilities.
I'll try to finish the wiki this week; that should be enough for a soft launch.
Thatâ€™s whatâ€™s taking the most time, plus I need to write tutorials, templates, guides, and more.

It's a web-based game framework that runs on the web, called NekoPlay. I had mentioned it in previous days. It's finished and should be available at niupleis.com, but I've been spending the past few weeks writing documentation in the form of a wiki...
This is what I've been working on:

That's ready, it just needs some refinement. Next, I'll make her jump.

NekoNoid is a text-based Arkanoid clone, I programmed it in about 4 hours.
This morning, I wanted to test a beta build, so I made NekoNoid.
I've been working on a game framework for a couple of weeks, and I'm testing it by making prototypes.
